gpat_q: Insulin can be described perfectly by
opt_1: A glycoprotein with a molecular weight of 6000
opt_2: A small protein with a molecular weight of 5808 having disulphide linkage
reason: insulin hormone consist of 21 amino acid two chains, chain A(21AA), and chain B(30 AA) connected with disulfide bond with molecular weight 5805 delton, insulin receptors are glycoprotein in nature

gpat_q: Which one of the following drug causes agranulocytosis ?
reason: Clozapine, tricyclic antidepressant, carbamazepine, chlorpromazine, valproic acid proven to cause granulocytosis.

gpat_q: Prolonged use of which of the following anticonvulsants can produce weight loss?
reason: Adverse effect of topiramate includes cognitive dysfunction, weight loss, kidney stone, dizziness, ataxia, Stevenson Johnson Syndrome
